## Context Awareness

::::: columns

::: {.column width="60%"}

Positron accesses metadata about the project. Thus **AI 'knows':**

-   **Files str.**: Code, docs
-   **Data**: Var. names, types
-   **History**: Edits, commands
-   **Environment**: Packages
-   **Intent**: Current task
-   **Results**: Output, errors

:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
**Why does it matter?**

-   Project-specific suggestions
-   Understands dependencies
-   Reduces hallucinations

:::

:::::

::: footer
**Read more:** [Positron: AI Context](https://positron.posit.co/assistant-chat-context.html){target="_blank"} | [GH Copilot](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/using-github-copilot/getting-started-with-github-copilot#understanding-copilot-context){target="_blank"} | [Claude](https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-sonnet-4-5){target="_blank"}
:::

## Efficient Prompting

::: incremental
::: {style="font-size: 0.6em;"}
- [ðŸŽ¯ **Be specific about the task**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: "Write a Stata do-file to â€¦" / "Refactor this R function to â€¦"

- [ðŸ§© **Provide context**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: goal, dataset description, key variables, constraints (WB rules, packages, runtime)

- [ðŸ“Œ **Define the expected output**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: table/figure format, file to modify, function signature, acceptance criteria

- [ðŸ” **Ask AI to summarize + clarify first**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: "Restate the task in your own words and ask any clarifying questions before implementing."

- [ðŸ” **Ask for assumptions + checks**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: "List assumptions; add validation/tests; include edge cases"

- [ðŸªœ **Iterate in small steps**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: request a minimal working change, then refine (donâ€™t "rewrite everything")

- [ðŸ§  **Force transparency**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: "Explain *why* this approach; give 1â€“2 alternatives with trade-offs"

- [ðŸ§¾ **Make it reproducible**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: "Use set seed; pin versions; avoid randomness; write comments; ask LLM to write comments"

- [ðŸ›‘ **Set boundaries**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: "Donâ€™t use external data; donâ€™t print secrets; donâ€™t change unrelated files"

## [Limitations]{style="color:#b00020;"} and [Remedies]{style="color:#1b5e20;"} {.smaller}

::: incremental
- [âš ï¸Ž **Wrong-but-plausible outputs / hallucinations**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: code runs but logic is wrong

  [âœ“ **Verify and validate**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: ask the model to **explain and justify** the solution

- [âš ï¸Ž **Context limits**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: not all files/data are in context; too large projects.

  [âœ“ **Be explicit**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: state assumptions, expected inputs/outputs, and references

- [âš ï¸Ž **Outdated knowledge**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: suggested APIs/packages/options may have changed

  [âœ“ **Teach the model**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: provide references/links; ask it to learn

- [âš ï¸Ž **Over-reliance**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: erodes fundamentals; mistakes slip through unchallenged

  [âœ“ **Keep learning**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: ask for step-by-step reasoning; request alternatives and trade-offs

- [âš ï¸Ž **Confidentiality / security / privacy**]{style="color:#b00020;"}

  [âœ“ **Constrain context**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: exclude sensitive data; use `.copilot-ignore`

- [âš ï¸Ž **Reproducibility**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: answers can vary across sessions/models/settings

  [âœ“ **Make it reproducible**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: save prompts, use Git; create AI agents

:::

::: footer
**Read more:** [GitHub Copilot Trust Center](https://resources.github.com/copilot-trust-center/){target="_blank"}
:::

# Where to Start?

-  Setup the software: follow [instructions](setup-instructions.qmd)

-  Step out of your comfort zone.

-  Experiment and learn by doing.

-  Ask AI to explain how to use the software.

-  Learn new technologies: [Git](https://positron.posit.co/git.html), GitHub, R, Python, they are are there for a good reason!

## Software Setup Overview

::: callout-note
**Full details:** [Setup Instructions](setup-instructions.qmd#setup)
:::

1.  **Install prerequisite software** (via WB Software Center)
    -   Stata 19+, R 4.5+, Python 3.13+, Quarto, Git
    -   Install Python `uv` package: `pip install uv`
2.  **Install Positron IDE** (system-level install):  Request help from IT if needed
3.  **Install key extensions** in Positron
    -   **Stata MCP**, **Quarto**
4.  **Connect GitHub**: Sign in to GitHub account
    -   Enable Positron Assistant in settings
    -   Configure LLM provider (GitHub Copilot/Claude/GPT)
5.  **Start experimenting!**
    -   Open assistant: `Ctrl+Shift+P` \> "Ask Positron Assistant"
    -   Try: chat, agent mode, inline code completion
